channel.title: My new Assult MiniGame. Better, bigger and epicer
channel.description:
;D
so far ive taken my old barbarian assult, a very basic one you would find on every server. and turned the metal dragon area into it. adding 2 stores, monsters that drop stuff. and 2 explaners.
2nd area almost done, on my next entry, ill post pictures

item.title: My new Assult MiniGame. Better, bigger and epicer
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:5, topic:348280”][quote author=Lin link=topic=444660.msg3265221#msg3265221 date=1278812904]
Epicer? Words with two syllables not ending in y cannot have ‘er’ at the end, and neither can words with 3 or more syllables. The proper term is ‘more epic’.[/quote]
you can just say that “epicer” is not a word in the english dictionary.[/quote]
But you can say it’s in the Moparscape dictionary.

Read full topic
item.source: My new Assult MiniGame. Better, bigger and epicer

item.title: My new Assult MiniGame. Better, bigger and epicer
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Lin:

Epicer? Words with two syllables not ending in y cannot have ‘er’ at the end, and neither can words with 3 or more syllables. The proper term is ‘more epic’.

you can just say that “epicer” is not a word in the english dictionary.

item.title: My new Assult MiniGame. Better, bigger and epicer
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Epicer? Words with two syllables not ending in y cannot have ‘er’ at the end, and neither can words with 3 or more syllables. The proper term is ‘more epic’.

On-topic, this isn’t really a place for something like this. You need to first off post pictures, and just creating areas doesn’t really count as anything major. Read the rules.

Read full topic
